title: Laemmle Theatres
content:
the best logo ever. :-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111017140519im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LaemmleTheatresLogo_6323.jpg)

MyFonts is not abble to suggest anything even close.  
I have the feeling it's a mix between several fonts.  
The capital "T" looks like an "F" without the "-".

Any idea welcome.  
Thank you for your help.
author: logicalnot

comments.content: The capitals look like [Roundhand bold BT](http://web.archive.org/web/20111017140519/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/roundhand/bold/), and the lowercase letters look like Times New Roman bold italic, all mechanically condensed.
